title: Flip Flopping On Premium Cigar Association (PCA)
itunes:title: Flip Flopping On Premium Cigar Association (PCA)
description:
This week on The After Show, Dave gets called out by a listener on his stance of not attending the Premium Cigar Association (PCA). Will he be able to convince Dave to attend the trade show? Will Dave continue to boycott attending? 

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
